column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The research we did and the advice we got told us to make a reservation in the downstairs Parlor
column2: because it was supposed to be more intimate and a cool
column3: jazzy place. That's how their website describes their atmosphere. And it looks the part when you walk in
column4: it really does. Until you start hearing gangster rap/ hip hop playing during your meal yelling out profanities while your wife sits with you.
